price: 18. Arrinkaa (waa fal Ilaahay) welibana Alle waa liciifiyaha dabinka gaalada.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُوهِنُ كَيۡدِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhālikum wa-anna al-laha mūhinu kaydi al-kāfirīna
